duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in implementing SharePoint, MS Teams, and Power Apps and integrating these technologies into the current business processes.
Advise on the creation and enforcement of governance policies.
Develop MS Teams templates and request necessary functionality within the technologies.
Assist end users in developing solutions using Teams and SharePoint, and develop solutions using Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI.
Provide first level support for Teams users.

education_certification.credential: Significant experience with Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Office Suite, Windows OS, and project management. Experience developing Power Platform solutions using Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI. Experience with Microsoft Teams - administration, installation, and configuration.
